fields.Title: YARD / HANGED MAN AUTOPSY
fields.Description:
This is phase two of the hanged man, after getting him down. 
1. Kim performs autopsy
2. More talk with inland

fields.Title: You: ""1. External examination -- now tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "1. External examination -- now that we have the chaincutters, let's cut the belt."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["yard.hanged_backed_off_from_getting_chaincutters"]  and  CheckItem("chaincutters")  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["yard.hanged_external_summary_done"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Where should I take these *n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Where should I take these *notes*?"

fields.Title: You: ""Well -- it's down." (Celebrate in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well -- it's down." (Celebrate in a more reserved manner.)

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, I feel like a detective.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I feel like a detective."

fields.Title: You: "Write down: Yes. Non-visual. Corrob..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write down: Yes. Non-visual. Corroborated by witness (see report).

fields.Title: You: ""This is the body of a soldier. A m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is the body of a soldier. A mercenary."

fields.Title: Logic: "It is very hard to struggle when yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It is very hard to struggle when you're dead. Death is the *end* of struggle.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse is indifferent to time o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse is indifferent to time of the Dead Light and Great Culling, just lies there. The next box says:

fields.Title: You: ""You're not gonna believe this -- I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're not gonna believe this -- I think I've *lost* my paperwork."

fields.Title: You: ""Only the first question and alread..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Only the first question and already I don't know the answer!"

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.raphael_ambrosius_costeau"] == false  and  Variable["tc.initials"] == false  and  Variable["tc.harry"] == false  and  Variable["tc.tequila_sunset"] == false  and  Variable["tc.name_full_harrier"] == false

fields.Title: You: "Write: probably Harry-something."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: probably Harry-something.

fields.Title: Logic: "HDB41-0803... help me out with the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: HDB41-0803... help me out with the time of day anyone?

fields.Title: Horrific Necktie: "*El Bigo Mistako*, lieutenant!"
fields.Dialogue Text: *El Bigo Mistako*, lieutenant!

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Above those -- an eleven field info..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Above those -- an eleven field info form needs filling out first. It begins with:

fields.Title: Shivers: "The building is tall, seven stories..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The building is tall, seven stories wind-wrapped in solitude; most of the apartments are unoccupied. This was a suicide. The other an accident -- the small one.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Which the assistant detective *ine..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Which the assistant detective *inexplicably* reported to me as X5415- something. Why was that, assistant detective?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He produces a measuring tape: "Well..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He produces a measuring tape: "Well nourished, athletically built measuring 1.80 metres. Generally consistent with age 42. Preservation is good, ambient temperature below freezing."
fields.Alternate1: He produces a measuring tape: "Well nourished, athletically built measuring 1.80 metres. Generally consistent with age -- about 50. Preservation is good, ambient temperature below freezing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course, I under-compensated." H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course, I under-compensated." He pockets the tape.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Talkin' shit about Cuno's velocity..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Talkin' shit about Cuno's velocity..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The steel wiring..." he concedes -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The steel wiring..." he concedes -- breathless, "there's too much of it. We *need* to remove the belt so we can get to the ligature mark."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ligature mark..." The lieutenant p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ligature mark..." The lieutenant produces a small folding knife. With the other hand pulling on the belt, he starts cutting into the polyester. The stench is horrid. After a while, it's obvious the material cannot be cut.

fields.Title: Empathy: "This is clearly what they've been w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This is clearly what they've been waiting for. Ever since the autopsy began. The lieutenant is trying to make it as boring as possible.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks relieved. "Bac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks relieved. "Back is symmetrical and intact. Upper and lower extremities are intact -- but asymmetrical. There are old combat injuries on the right hand, thigh, and hip."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "I did, Cobo, I did. Reminded me of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I did, Cobo, I did. Reminded me of when I was just a small boy. Before *this* happened to my face and my body. You did me a kindness there.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "With his eyes almost closed, the li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: With his eyes almost closed, the lieutenant puts his hand on the dead man's throat and begins to massage it, gently. A rotting smell erupts from the mouth. Purge fluid runs down his lips -- black and viscous.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Are you a hepatobiliary expert?" H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Are you a hepatobiliary expert?" He looks at the corpse's stomach with a mixture of tiredness and disgust.

fields.Title: You: ""*Both*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*Both*?"

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: "Write: N/A and add *toxicology requ..."]
Cunoesse: ""Is he touching it again? What is *..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Is he touching it again? What is *wrong* with these *mulkkus*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "This appears to be a case investiga..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This appears to be a case investigated about three weeks ago -- a workplace accident. The titular character's wife tried to get *compensation*. The company was not forthcoming. It's hard to make out if the hole was fatal.

fields.Title: You: ""2. Contusions.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "2. Contusions."

fields.Title: You: ""3. Ligature mark." (Finish the aut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "3. Ligature mark." (Finish the autopsy.)

fields.Title: You: ""What's the fourth injury field for?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's the fourth injury field for?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "There's a pause. "I don't think we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's a pause. "I don't think we should mention that. Better not to muddy the waters."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's right. What's next?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right. What's next?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Fucking fatal as SHIT, *Seol-man*!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking fatal as SHIT, *Seol-man*!"

fields.Title: Shivers: "A small green enclosure in the midd..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A small green enclosure in the middle of a corral of tenements: Capeside Apartments, Whirling-in-Rags and the fortress wall of Terminal B. Above it -- a thin blanket of coastal stratus clouds.

fields.Title: You: "Was I right?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Was I right?

fields.Title: You: "Rub your sides, close your eyes."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rub your sides, close your eyes.

fields.Title: You: ""No, this is clearly a fatal injury..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, this is clearly a fatal injury. Lets mark it as such."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then -- given the state of decay h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then -- given the state of decay here, I consider establishing the victim's ethnicity a minor success."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""However, a piece of professional a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "However, a piece of professional advice. The next time you encounter a list of topics with numbers on them -- start with 1. Then: 2. Then: 3. Lists are numbered for a reason."

fields.Title: You: "What was that, a bump?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What was that, a bump?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We've heard a nom de guerre -- Lel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We've heard a nom de guerre -- Lely. It's better than nothing. Write it down."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The chest was intact, normal conto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The chest was intact, normal contours. Abdomen protuberant, pelvis intact. No injuries in genital region."

fields.Title: You: "Try to remove the dead man's boots."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try to remove the dead man's boots.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["yard.hanged_boots_removed"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_the_boots_off_the_hanged_mans_feet"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.get_the_boots_off_the_hanged_mans_feet_done"] == false  and  Variable["yard.hanged_tried_removing_boots"] == false

fields.Title: You: "(Clap your gloved hands.) "Let's ge..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Clap your gloved hands.) "Let's get in there."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "You must have me confused with the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You must have me confused with the *Copopedia*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine," the lieutenant sighs. "It's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine," the lieutenant sighs. "It's a three-part form to be filled out on the scene, by the detectives responsible. One takes notes, the other dictates. The goal is to establish cause of death."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sure it's somewhere.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sure it's somewhere."

fields.Title: You: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: You: "What? What's there?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What? What's there?

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant adjusts his glasses..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm," he nods. "We have a real mus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm," he nods. "We have a real museum here. Of battles, wars..."

fields.Title: Logic: "This will do."
fields.Dialogue Text: This will do.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Hmm hmm hmm... I'm sure we didn't g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hmm hmm hmm... I'm sure we didn't get *everything*. There's always *something*...

fields.Title: Drama: "It was merely a *jest* -- horseplay..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It was merely a *jest* -- horseplay! But now it looks like you're a total *psychopath*, jeopardizing the crime scene...

fields.Title: You: ""Let's jump ahead to the three part..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's jump ahead to the three part summary!"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "That's because he doesn't want to b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's because he doesn't want to bring up the messy question of your *initials*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And what would that make the alpha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And what would that make the alphanumeric?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "11:11. It's *meaningful*."
fields.Dialogue Text: 11:11. It's *meaningful*.

fields.Title: You: ""6. Race:""
fields.Dialogue Text: "6. Race:"

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse lies there, indifferent..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse lies there, indifferent to your retrograde amnesia. The next box says:

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Elsewhere yet, an obese female sits..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Elsewhere yet, an obese female sits in a wicker chair, her silhouette ball-like against the window. Outside: Grand Couron. The day is turning dim for Sergeant Mack Torson. Hand extended, he approaches. To make sure she *is* dead, more than anything else...

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "...and so all across Jamrock, Coal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...and so all across Jamrock, Coal City, G.R.I.H. Forty two deceased persons found today -- forty two Stations of Breath.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.
fields.Alternate1: Write it down -- underline *Vermillion*.

fields.Title: You: "Touch the corpse's hair before movi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Touch the corpse's hair before moving on.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The hair under your latex fingers f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The hair under your latex fingers feels cold to touch, wet.

fields.Title: You: "Write down, but amend for *high* ve..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write down, but amend for *high* velocity.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Damn corpse. We had a good rhythm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Damn corpse. We had a good rhythm going..." The lieutenant gets up and brushes his pants.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "A really, really bad smell is comin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A really, really bad smell is coming from there now. And... some kind of cracking sound.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The rope rises to a point, leaving..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The rope rises to a point, leaving a *gap* in the ligature mark. The suspension point is in the back of the neck." The lieutenant has kneeled closer, running his finger along the dark red groove -- until there's a gap.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Genitalia is male and unremarkable..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Genitalia is male and unremarkable. No evidence of injury."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, yes -- your hunch, before." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, yes -- your hunch, before." He takes a moment to breathe. "We could have a semen analysis requested from Processing, but we're already requesting toxicology. There's a one test limit."

fields.Title: You: ""No, I was trying to get a *psychic..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I was trying to get a *psychic* read."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Back is symmetrical and intact." H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Back is symmetrical and intact." He struggles to turn the corpse on his side. "Upper and lower extremities are intact, but asymmetrical. There are combat injuries on the right hand, thigh, and hip."

fields.Title: You: "I'm from..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm from...

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Mmm... *brimming* with cocaine."
fields.Dialogue Text: Mmm... *brimming* with cocaine.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse with his pants down does..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse with his pants down does not have an opinion on the subject. All he has is genitals and a deathly odour.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down, keep the *voil*!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down, keep the *voil*!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay, so there's an incision on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, so there's an incision on the thorax, from a chaincutter." There's a pause. "I wouldn't mention it. Better not to muddy the waters."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "Head, chest, and scalp bi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods. "Head, chest, and scalp bite mark injuries. Predation by birds has caused damage to the body. Odontologist does not need to be consulted."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And your opinion, officer?" Beneat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "And your opinion, officer?" Beneath the description there are two boxes waiting to be ticked:

fields.Title: You: ""No -- the great skua.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No -- the great skua."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""For god's sake, leave the box unti..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "For god's sake, leave the box unticked then. What next?"

fields.Title: You: ""Non-fatal, post-mortem.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Non-fatal, post-mortem."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""At MAXIMUM velocity, fucko!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "At MAXIMUM velocity, fucko!"

fields.Title: You: ""B: Non-fatal, post-mortem.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "B: Non-fatal, post-mortem."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why do you say that?" He tilts his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why do you say that?" He tilts his head.
fields.Alternate1: "Why do you say that?" He tilts his head. "Is it the seagull-murder again, or are you serious?"
fields.Alternate2: "Why do you say that?" He tilts his head. "Is it like that *fatal* stone injury, or are you serious?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm, yes. I didn't want to mention..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm, yes. I didn't want to mention it before, but you really should find your clothes." He looks at his notebook.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very dramatic. Nevertheless, I wou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very dramatic. Nevertheless, I would appreciate it if you'd just put your clothes back on." He looks at his notebook.

fields.Title: You: ""Good thing we got these *chaincutt..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good thing we got these *chaincutters*." (Pull out the rubber gripped cutters.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They're better than nothing..." Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They're better than nothing..." The lieutenant looks at the gloves. "Tell you what: I perform the anatomical side of things, while you will take notes."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In your paperwork, officer. Just f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In your paperwork, officer. Just fill out the field autopsy form." He sighs, already expecting the answer.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I mean when I need you to. Until t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I mean when I need you to. Until then -- I should handle physical contact and you should take notes."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's either this, *or* we complete..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's either this, *or* we complete the initial interviews. We already met Evrart, but didn't *quite* get his interview done -- for that we would have to ask him about the *lynching*. Like we did with Joyce."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Fuck are you talking to, clown?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck are you talking to, clown?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." He shows you the point on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm." He shows you the point on the man's neck where belt cuts into the flesh. "Cut with as much *precision* as you can, please."

fields.Title: You: ""Well done -- sounds like it would..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well done -- sounds like it would throw us off if we didn't know..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lividity *appears* consistent with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lividity *appears* consistent with hanging -- but is not. The head is congested. Contusions are present on the head and chest -- consistent with stones thrown postmortem; low velocity..."
fields.Alternate1: "Lividity appears consistent with hanging -- albeit *faint*, ergo: postmortem. The head is congested. Contusions are present on the head and chest, consistent with stones thrown; low velocity..."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Oh yeah -- finally. Let's get *in t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yeah -- finally. Let's get *in there*.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "What was that about no clawing arou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What was that about no clawing around the neck? You'd be clawing for your life...

fields.Title: You: "Try to remove the dead man's boots..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try to remove the dead man's boots again.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["yard.hanged_boots_removed"] == false  and  Variable["TASK.get_the_boots_off_the_hanged_mans_feet"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.get_the_boots_off_the_hanged_mans_feet_done"] == false  and  (Variable["yard.hanged_tried_removing_boots"] == true  or  Variable["yard.hanged_tried_to_remove_boots_once"] == true)

fields.Title: Empathy: "He doesn't actually think it's 'int..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He doesn't actually think it's 'interesting' that the boots have disappeared -- it's just sad, sad and unprofessional.

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I was the one who took t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I was the one who took the boots. I can tell you the right serial number -- it's E50.100.1000."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's go find mine. We have to fin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's go find mine. We have to find it sooner or later."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's right," he nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right," he nods.

fields.Title: You: ""3. Description of injuries -- summ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "3. Description of injuries -- summary."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.perform_field_autopsy_done"] == false  and  IsKimHere()  and  ((Variable["yard.hanged_autopsy_ain_hub_reached"] == true  and  (Variable["yard.hanged_injury_hub_both_first"] == true  and  Variable["yard.hanged_wounds_ligature"] == true  and  Variable["yard.hanged_wounds_ligature_hyoid"] == true) == false)  or  Variable["yard.hanged_injury_hub_reached"])

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse does not object, he lies..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse does not object, he lies slumped to the side stinking. The ground underneath him is saturated in purge liquids.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The dead man stares in silence as y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The dead man stares in silence as you crack open the ledger. The bright red paper is covered in boxes and lists -- describing the condition of his skin and organs in three parts.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse is indifferent to your s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse is indifferent to your scribblings, just lies there. The next box says:

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse looks ageless, like meat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse looks ageless, like meat on a hook.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Interfering with the body's positi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Interfering with the body's position or wounds postmortem."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The boots are ceramic, vitreous en..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The boots are ceramic, vitreous enamel. They're fused to his skin from blood flowing downward postmortem. Removal of the boots is left for Processing."
fields.Alternate1: "The rest of the clothes have been removed postmortem by scavengers. In order to get to the victim's ceramic armour. Officers are in search of the missing pieces -- removal of the boots is left for Processing."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The boot has a serial number." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The boot has a serial number." He twists the dead man's foot: "It's E50.100.1000. The lines between the plates are in the shape of the alphanumerical. The number is purposefully concealed by the design."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's wonderful, officer. My opin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's wonderful, officer. My opinion of you has lowered. Go ahead, write down a stupid nonsensical number in the autopsy form too -- instead of E50.100.1000."

fields.Title: You: "Write: AO5577789RHG9999..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: AO5577789RHG9999...

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The stench is suffocating. Strands..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The stench is suffocating. Strands of dark brown hair start sticking to the latex of the glove -- like thread off a rag doll's head.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""You are," he says with calm certai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You are," he says with calm certainty. "You're Cuno's pig."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""*NOW* IT'S GONNA HAPPEN! C!!!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "*NOW* IT'S GONNA HAPPEN! C!!!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, yes -- your hunch, before. We..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ah, yes -- your hunch, before. We can have a semen analysis requested -- from Processing -- if that's what you meant."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. Processing. Science. That's w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Processing. Science. That's what I meant."

fields.Title: You: "Am I an expert in those things?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Am I an expert in those things?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it."

fields.Title: You: ""Can we change it to toxicology? Se..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can we change it to toxicology? Seems prudent."

fields.Title: You: ""Oh, so here it is!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh, so here it is!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "It's very hard to draw conclusions...."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's very hard to draw conclusions. All you can make out is that he is in a hurry to solve the case -- the tempo of the handwriting says as much -- and that there are *a lot* of notes in there. Most of them are made prior to arriving at the scene, in preparation.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid we can only fill this i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid we can only fill this in once the belt is removed from his neck and we have visual on the injury."

fields.Title: You: ""This man was murdered by seagulls.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This man was murdered by seagulls."

fields.Title: You: ""A: Opinion -- fatal injury.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A: Opinion -- fatal injury."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. Non-fatal, post-mortem.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. Non-fatal, post-mortem."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "He produces a small black plastic r..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now?" He pockets it. "Now we put h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now?" He pockets it. "Now we put him in a body bag and I drive him to Faubourg -- for processing..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This, I remind you, also necessita..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This, I remind you, also necessitates the removal of the belt from around his neck. So we have a visual on the injury."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""I need a pair then... Can we retur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need a pair then... Can we return to this shortly? We have glove-hunting to do."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's not go *glove-hunting*, plea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's not go *glove-hunting*, please. Let's use division of labour -- I perform the anatomical side, while you take notes."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'll ask you when I need you to. F..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll ask you when I need you to. For the most part, maybe I should handle the contact and you take notes?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Good call! Never mind that *old tra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good call! Never mind that *old trash container*lurching there, full of bad old news...

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Talkin' to the dead man. Psycho co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Talkin' to the dead man. Psycho cop."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What's next -- date of birth?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's next -- date of birth?"

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Please get yourself together, the l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Please get yourself together, the lieutenant from Precinct 57 thinks.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse cannot feel Kim's hand o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse cannot feel Kim's hand on his chest. It no longer meaningfully interacts with its surroundings. A thicket of boxes and lists on red copier paper tries to answer *why*:

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, let's fill out the info form f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, let's fill out the info form first."

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The pudgy mess of curdled meat look..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The pudgy mess of curdled meat looks neither *Mondial* nor anything other.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Male.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Male."

fields.Title: Cunoesse: "The disappointment is palpable -- t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The disappointment is palpable -- the red haired thing was expecting something more lurid.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Note. The boot has a hidden serial..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Note. The boot has a hidden serial number on it." He crouches, twisting the dead man's foot: "It's E50.100.1000..."

fields.Title: You: ""There there, baby.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "There there, baby."

fields.Title: You: "Write it down, adding the brilliant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down, adding the brilliantine.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "After some deliberation you sink th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: After some deliberation you sink the cutters into the knot tying the belt together. You squeeze the rubber handles together, sweat forming on your brow...

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, better to leave it at that. M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, better to leave it at that. More important."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's change it to that, seems mor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's change it to that, seems more important."

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Nothing. Just in case.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nothing. Just in case."

fields.Title: You: ""I agree. The waters are muddy enou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree. The waters are muddy enough."

fields.Title: You: ""B: Non-fatal, post-mortem.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "B: Non-fatal, post-mortem."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right. Next?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. Next?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""I do what I want, C." He spits. "L..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I do what I want, C." He spits. "Learn it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's it." He cracks an uneasy sm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it." He cracks an uneasy smile. "We have established cause of death. It's not much -- and it leaves much to be questioned -- but it's a *start*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh..." The lieutenant falls silen..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh..." The lieutenant falls silent, abruptly.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. *Why* don't you think it was..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. *Why* don't you think it was fatal?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""You are," he says with calm certai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You are," he says with calm certainty. "This pig is Cuno's."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We also requested a toxicological..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We also requested a toxicological screening -- that was thorough. The results should arrive in a couple of weeks. If we're lucky. I would not hold my breath..."

fields.Title: You: "Rip out a copy of the autopsy pages..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Rip out a copy of the autopsy pages.

fields.Title: You: "Tell me something, dead man."
fields.Dialogue Text: Tell me something, dead man.

fields.Title: You: ""OK, I'll take it like a man.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "OK, I'll take it like a man."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't know. What do you mean?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know. What do you mean?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes... well." The lieutenant doesn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes... well." The lieutenant doesn't know what to say.

fields.Title: You: "Begone foul sensation of worry!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Begone foul sensation of worry!

fields.Title: You: ""This scarring is extensive. Way mo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This scarring is extensive. Way more than a law official's."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's right. No clawing marks on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's right. No clawing marks on the neck, no signs of struggle on the crime scene. And a witness statement from the perpetrators all confirm: wound is post-mortem. Treatment."
fields.Alternate1: "That's right. No clawing marks on the neck, no signs of struggle on the wrists. A witness statement from the perpetrators confirms: wound is post-mortem. Treatment."
fields.Alternate2: "That's right. No clawing marks on the neck, no signs of struggle on the crime scene, faint lividity. A witness statement from the perpetrators confirms: wound is post-mortem. Treatment."
fields.Alternate3: "That's right. No clawing marks on the neck, no signs of struggle on the wrists, faint lividity. A witness statement from the perpetrators confirms: wound is post-mortem. Treatment."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Clothes," he begins. "The deceased..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Clothes," he begins. "The deceased..." He blinks, staring at the body. "The deceased *used* to wear a pair of armoured boots -- they're gone now. Interesting."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Oops. A bad feeling comes over you...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oops. A bad feeling comes over you...

fields.Title: You: ""Where should I take these notes? I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Where should I take these notes? In my paperwork?" (Take out your ledger.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe you *should*?" He looks at h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe you *should*?" He looks at his blue notebook and sighs.

fields.Title: You: ""Shouldn't we file the coroner's ca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Shouldn't we file the coroner's case under *me*? Technically, I arrived at the scene before you."

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Fucky-fucky!" the little monster e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucky-fucky!" the little monster exclaims, energetically.

fields.Title: You: ""I agree. Lividity pointed to a lyn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree. Lividity pointed to a lynching."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not so sure. Didn't the footpr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not so sure. Didn't the footprints look like he was *carried* over?"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""C, it's happening!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "C, it's happening!"

fields.Title: You: "Omit the boots."
fields.Dialogue Text: Omit the boots.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: You: ""May I try?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "May I try?"

fields.Title: You: ""Let's go get them." [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's go get them." [Leave.]

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "We should do this more often. Be cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We should do this more often. Be close like this, I mean.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Whooh..." He turns to the side to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Whooh..." He turns to the side to breathe -- it's not enough. He buries his face in the sleeve of his jacket. You hear a muffled voice: "That's *all* for the external. Well done! What next?"

fields.Title: You: ""I'll write N/A.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll write N/A."

fields.Title: You: "Write: N/A"
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: N/A

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "That's not good. Trust among office..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That's not good. Trust among officers is extremely important. If you don't improve your rapport, there could be consequences down the line...

fields.Title: You: "Turn the page back."
fields.Dialogue Text: Turn the page back.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "You should touch it."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should touch it.

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Bitch saying your injuries weren't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Bitch saying your injuries weren't *fatal*, Cuno. You gonna let it stand?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's see, what did we find..." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's see, what did we find..." He scratches his chin as he leafs through his notes. "We observed haemorrhaging on the skin above and below the ligature mark. Well pronounced, consistent with a drop from 1 or 1.5 metres."

fields.Title: You: ""2. Internal examination -- where w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "2. Internal examination -- where were we?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "*You*, sir -- you are the Copopedia..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *You*, sir -- you are the Copopedia.

fields.Title: Volition: "You're being *handled*. If you resi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're being *handled*. If you resist now he will turn on his heavy duty authority mode. You'll get your chance to dig in -- later.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm sorry I lost everything.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm sorry I lost everything."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's either this, *or* we complete..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's either this, *or* we complete the initial interviews. We already met Evrart -- that only leaves the Wild Pines representative. There's one in town, negotiating the strike. She could have information."
fields.Alternate1: "It's either this, *or* we complete the initial interviews. We already met Evrart *and* Joyce -- but didn't *quite* get Joyce's interview done. For that we have to ask her about the *lynching* -- not just talk to her."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Somewhere, Lieutenant Kitsuragi is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere, Lieutenant Kitsuragi is preparing a report. He should be here for this, you realise. You have to return later.

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "You don't even have a joke."
fields.Dialogue Text: You don't even have a joke.

fields.Title: You: "Write: Harry Du Bois."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: Harry Du Bois.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["tc.harry"]  and  Variable["tc.du_bois"]  and  Variable["tc.name_full_harrier"] == false

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Man up, pig. You're embarrassing C..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Man up, pig. You're embarrassing Cuno."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. Barely." He looks at his blue..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. Barely." He looks at his blue notebook and sighs.

fields.Title: You: ""1. External examination -- summary.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "1. External examination -- summary."
fields.Alternate1: "1. External examination -- summary."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["yard.hanged_autopsy_ain_hub_reached"] == true  and  (Variable["yard.hanged_backed_off_from_getting_chaincutters"]  and  CheckItem("chaincutters")) == false  and  IsKimHere()  and  Variable["yard.hanged_external_summary_done"] == false

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's." The lieutenant nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's." The lieutenant nods.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's you.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's you."

fields.Title: You: ""HDB41-0803." (No time of arrival.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "HDB41-0803." (No time of arrival.)

fields.Title: You: "Leave it empty."
fields.Dialogue Text: Leave it empty.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Babroudine, yes. Inexpensive. Size..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Babroudine, yes. Inexpensive. Size M. Colour: white."

fields.Title: You: "Keep petting him."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep petting him.

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""That was some sick shit, *sekop*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That was some sick shit, *sekop*."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Told you my pig was hard core.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Told you my pig was hard core."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Haemorrhaging is observed on the s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Haemorrhaging is observed on the skin above and below the ligature mark. The mark is well pronounced, consistent with a drop from 1 or 1.5 metres."
fields.Alternate1: "Haemorrhaging is observed on the skin above and below the ligature mark. It is well pronounced, consistent with a drop from 1 or 1.5 metres." He wipes his forehead. "That's a visual on the injury for part 3."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The dead man's penis is average-siz..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The dead man's penis is average-sized, congested from the downward collection of blood. The testicles are uneven in length, hanging underneath. The genitalia is greenish; marbling is present around the crotch.

fields.Title: You: "It's an experiment. To see what hap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's an experiment. To see what happens.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "You manage to suppress the contract..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You manage to suppress the contractions trying to empty your stomach -- all it takes is concentration. Through it, you see nothing but darkness. More meat and darkness...

fields.Title: You: "Write: N/A."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: N/A.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Neither am I.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Neither am I."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You find a moment, as the lieutenan..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You find a moment, as the lieutenant inspects the dead man's fingernails. Just a few glances. The pages are filled with a bulky freehand that's nearly illegible...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Or the incision on the thorax -- f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Or the incision on the thorax -- from a chaincutter? Neither was a team effort. And I wouldn't mention them. Muddies the water."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Below the note, two boxes wait to b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Below the note, two boxes wait to be ticked. The dead man's head jerks to the side -- awaiting your judgement. The ring around his neck is visible.
fields.Alternate1: Below the note, two customary boxes wait to be ticked. The man's head jerks to the side -- awaiting your judgement. The ring around his neck is visible.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't like the colouration. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't like the colouration. The lividity did not convince me."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Losing your paperwork is not a sma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Losing your paperwork is not a small issue. I'm sorry if I came off as patronizing." He looks at his notebook.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Back was symmetrical and intact, u..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Back was symmetrical and intact, upper and lower extremities also -- but asymmetrical." The lieutenant nods along to his meticulous overview. "Old combat injuries on the right hand, thigh, and hip."

fields.Title: You: ""I have gardening gloves, maybe the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have gardening gloves, maybe they are enough?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Somewhere *else*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Somewhere *else*?"

fields.Title: You: "Begone strange feeling."
fields.Dialogue Text: Begone strange feeling.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Trying not to bring the incident up..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Trying not to bring the incident up any more.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not much later, I hope." He looks..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not much later, I hope." He looks at the man's rotting remains. "He's about to... *melt away* soon."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. Now, the way I see it..." He..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. Now, the way I see it..." He looks at the corpse with some disgust...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The RCM's four-phase murder scene p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The RCM's four-phase murder scene processing manual.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not seeing anything yet -- but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not seeing anything yet -- but we *know* there's tampering here." He thinks. "Write down: Yes. Non-visual. Corroborated by witness (see report)."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Be *thorough* if you want maximum r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Be *thorough* if you want maximum results.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sorry doesn't cut it here. Let's m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry doesn't cut it here. Let's move on."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer, what *haven't* you lost?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Officer, what *haven't* you lost?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should locate your ledger, then..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should locate your ledger, then hurry back to the autopsy as soon as possible."

fields.Title: You: ""Hmm-hmm..." (Take a peek at Kim's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmm-hmm..." (Take a peek at Kim's notes.)

fields.Title: You: ""2. Coroner's case no:""
fields.Dialogue Text: "2. Coroner's case no:"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm gonna write: 42.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm gonna write: 42."

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Nor does he look male, with his pre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nor does he look male, with his pregnant belly and indistinguishable face.

fields.Title: You: "Turn the page."
fields.Dialogue Text: Turn the page.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm a total psychopath, you see. I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm a total psychopath, you see. I lie all the time."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "More hair sticks to the glove -- ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: More hair sticks to the glove -- hair off the rain soaked head of a dead man. There are bumps and dips on the skull below. An alien landscape.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Nothing is as nothing does! This wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing is as nothing does! This was pleasurable. I sincerely thank you for touching my hand.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hands are clean," the lieutenant s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hands are clean," the lieutenant says as five cold, sausage-like fingers slip from your hand. "No sign of injury from struggling."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear cracks as the lieutenant m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You hear cracks as the lieutenant moves his sharp fingers inside the flesh. Like the creaking of an old house at night.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Nothing in your alcohol-soaked memo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing in your alcohol-soaked memory directs to having forensic expertise on either one.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "... then: "Digested semisolid food..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ... then: "Digested semisolid food in stomach -- voil." He touches the corpse's bloated lower abdomen -- briefly.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Maybe you're imagining it, but ther..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe you're imagining it, but there are some remarks in there -- and they're not all negative! You're referred to as 'the 41st' -- by your station number. And...

fields.Title: You: "Better not to know -- back to somet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Better not to know -- back to something else!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay. So there's a spin-stabilized..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. So there's a spin-stabilized munition -- from a Kiejl A9/90 muzzleloader -- lodged in his lung."

fields.Title: Empathy: "The lieutenant's admission has caus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant's admission has caused great gratitude in Cuno. He is silent with it.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Coagulated blood sticks to his scal..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Coagulated blood sticks to his scalp and chest -- where the countless stones have hit the dead man. Beneath the description of injury, two boxes:

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No-no officer, I'm afraid I disagr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No-no officer, I'm afraid I disagree now. We should leave the question open -- at least for the time being. If necessary, I can always amend this later. In my paperwork."

fields.Title: You: ""Let's bag him. Take him away." (Le..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's bag him. Take him away." (Let the lieutenant take the body away without further examination.)
fields.Alternate1: "Let's bag him. Take him away." (The lieutenant takes the body away -- you work alone for the rest of the day.)
fields.Alternate2: "Let's drag him to the Kineema." (You're finished with the corpse.)

fields.Title: You: "Why don't you know? What use are yo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why don't you know? What use are you?

fields.Title: You: ""Do you have another pair of gloves?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do you have another pair of gloves?"

fields.Title: You: ""Yes.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes."

fields.Title: You: "Where?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Where?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should start the postmortem.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should start the postmortem."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The upper torso is covered in a si..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The upper torso is covered in a single tattoo, beginning on the right shoulder and reaching around the heart. The shape is abstract. The ink is blue and white."
fields.Alternate1: "The upper torso is covered in a single, continuous tattoo resembling a microelectronical circuit board. It reaches from the right shoulder to the heart. The ink is blue and white."
fields.Alternate2: "The upper torso is covered in a single, continuous tattoo resembling a national pattern. It reaches from the right shoulder to the heart. The ink is blue and white."
fields.Alternate3: "The upper torso is covered in a single, continuous tattoo resembling a map of the night sky. It reaches from the right shoulder to the heart. The ink is blue and white."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes." He covers his nose and lists..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes." He covers his nose and lists: "One, investigation of the scene. Two, inital examination of the victim. Three, field autopsy. Four, transportation of the body to the morgue. We're on number three."

fields.Title: You: ""Don't we have someone else for thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't we have someone else for this? A doctor?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good call.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good call."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You told me the wrong serial numbe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You told me the wrong serial number." The lieutenant grows very still. "Why would you do that? Why would you jeopardize your own crime scene? And now the boots are gone, too. This could have been a lead."

fields.Title: You: ""My shoes. I have both of them. I f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My shoes. I have both of them. I found the *other* one too!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. Otherwise you would only hav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. Otherwise you would only have *one* shoe, now..." He looks at his notebook.

fields.Title: You: "Write: Harrier Du Bois."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: Harrier Du Bois.
fields.Alternate1: Write: Harrier Du Bois, lieutenant double-yefreitor.

fields.Title: Logic: "KK = Kim Kitsuragi; 57 = Precinct 5..."
fields.Dialogue Text: KK = Kim Kitsuragi; 57 = Precinct 57; followed by his date (08.03) and time of arrival (08:15) on the scene. He's indexed the case after himself, not you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Next?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Next?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmh," the lieutenant corrects his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh," the lieutenant corrects his glasses: "roughly 50."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Just leave it empty, officer.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Just leave it empty, officer."

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Somewhere in Jamrock North, a small..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Somewhere in Jamrock North, a small wood shed behind Rozenkrantz Row, Lieutenant Nick Feuerbach puts his hand to the chest of a small corpse, no larger than a monkey. It's raining outside, light drizzle. There is darkness in the shed.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Clothes," he begins. "The deceased..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Clothes," he begins. "The deceased wears armoured boots and white briefs. The make of the briefs is Babroudine I think. Let's see..." He turns the body onto its side to check the underwear label.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant watches you, in sile..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant watches you, in silence.

fields.Title: You: "Write down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write down.

fields.Title: You: "I'm detecting. Police work. Doesn't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm detecting. Police work. Doesn't have to be *solicited*.

fields.Title: You: "Let the lieutenant work alone."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let the lieutenant work alone.

fields.Title: You: "Pleased to meet you -- are you priv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pleased to meet you -- are you private military by any chance? I just want to be sure...
fields.Alternate1: Pleased to meet you -- are you private military by any chance? Krenel, maybe? I just want to be sure...

fields.Title: You: ""If I may add the *moral* of this s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If I may add the *moral* of this story..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Muscoskeletal -- purge fluid is co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Muscoskeletal -- purge fluid is coming from the mouth." He gets close to the swollen mouth-hole, eyes squinting from the fumes: "Not injury related. Eyes and tongue protuberant. Hyoid bone... let's see."
fields.Alternate1: "Good. Muscoskeletal. Purge fluid is coming from the mouth." He gets close to the mouth-hole, eyes squinting from the stench: "Not injury related. Eyes and tongue protuberant. Hyoid bone... let's see."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The hyoid bone is *fractured*," he..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The hyoid bone is *fractured*," he says after a while. "The rest of the muscoskeletal system is intact, unremarkable."

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: You: ""Why? Don't we have anything?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why? Don't we have anything?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Cardiovascular. The body exhibits..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cardiovascular. The body exhibits lividity in the lower extremities -- feet, hands, and neck -- visually consistent with a hanging."
fields.Alternate1: "Cardiovascular. The body exhibits heavy lividity. Blood has gathered in the hands, feet, and neck. Hypostasis is visually consistent with a hanging.
fields.Alternate2: "Cardiovascular. The body exhibits some lividity. Blood has gathered in the hands, feet, and neck. Hypostasis is visually consistent with a hanging. Note: lividity is not very well pronounced."

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Hanged Man: "The corpse lays slouched to the sid..."]
Empathy: "Between the stench of death and the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Between the stench of death and the neverending corpse-examination, he's under some stress there. Better not to poke.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We were not *too* sloppy with the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We were not *too* sloppy with the injuries. We did not describe the contusions. We did not provide an opinion. But given the circumstances -- it is excusable. And they were clearly not fatal."

fields.Title: You: ""Can't we go back and fill those ou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Can't we go back and fill those out?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The next time you encounter a list..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The next time you encounter a list of topics with numbers on it -- start with 1. Then 2. Then 3. Lists are numbered for a reason. It is the *intended* order."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He's thinking: Did I miss something..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's thinking: Did I miss something?

fields.Title: You: "Write: 'fucky-fucky'."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: 'fucky-fucky'.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very dramatic. Nevertheless, I wou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very dramatic. Nevertheless, I would appreciate it if you'd at least put your jacket back on." He looks at his notebook.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Come on, officer." He pulls on a p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Come on, officer." He pulls on a pair of  latex gloves. "You know what a field autopsy is. You've done a hundred of them."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's either this, *or* we complete..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's either this, *or* we complete the initial interviews. We already met Evrart, but didn't *quite* get his interview done -- for that we have to ask him about the lynching. There's also a Wild Pines representative in town. She could have some information."
fields.Alternate1: "It's either this, *or* we complete the initial interviews. We already met Evrart but we didn't *quite* get his interview done -- for that we would have to ask him about the lynching. Similarly, we met Joyce but did not ask her about the lynching either."

fields.Title: You: ""No need for a distraction. Let's d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need for a distraction. Let's do this."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant adjusts his glasses..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ellis Kortenaer -- we have a *full..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ellis Kortenaer -- we have a *full* name to provide here..." He seems satisifed.

fields.Title: You: "When *am* I gonna get them?"
fields.Dialogue Text: When *am* I gonna get them?

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Yes. That's much better form than y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes. That's much better form than you had.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not particularly -- him being *dea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not particularly -- him being *dead* when they carried him over..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Seriously -- I can just bag him an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Seriously -- I can just bag him and drive him to the morgue any time you tell me to. No need for heroics -- unless you want to..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But he's still wearing his white b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "But he's still wearing his white briefs -- thank god for that. The make of the briefs is 'Babroudine' I think. Let's see..." He turns the body onto its side to check the underwear label.

fields.Title: You: ""Sorry.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Sorry."

fields.Title: You: "Open the notebook at the field auto..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open the notebook at the field autopsy form.

fields.Title: You: ""4. Date of birth:""
fields.Dialogue Text: "4. Date of birth:"

fields.Title: You: "Write: 50."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: 50.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not an energetic start to an autop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not an energetic start to an autopsy, I agree."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse lays slouched to the sid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse lays slouched to the side, oblivious to its surroundings. The field autopsy form describes his state in three parts:

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Oops. A bad feeling comes over you...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oops. A bad feeling comes over you...

fields.Title: Drama: "It was merely a *jest* -- horseplay..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It was merely a *jest* -- horseplay! The impression of you being *a total psychopath* is wrong.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The stench is suffocating. Strands..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The stench is suffocating. Strands of dark brown hair start sticking to your hand, like thread off a rag doll's head.

fields.Title: You: ""Fuckady-fuck...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuckady-fuck..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks by, somewhat w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks by, somewhat worried as you summon power words to your aid.

fields.Title: You: ""No, give them back, I was just abo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, give them back, I was just about to cut it off."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No you weren't, officer -- that wo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No you weren't, officer -- that would be preposterous." He shakes his head. "Just write down that we request a semen, vaginal, and anal fluids analysis."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""My pig's so *FUCKIN' ILL* right no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My pig's so *FUCKIN' ILL* right now..." His voice swells with pride.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I was. Maybe I'm just not seeing t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I was. Maybe I'm just not seeing them... Honestly, the stench is making it hard for me to think at the moment."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "It's hard. You taste stomach acid i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's hard. You taste stomach acid in the back of your throat. A contraction -- your throat pumps a little something from your stomach and into your mouth. You're forced to swallow, just to keep looking...
fields.Alternate1: It's hard. Once more you taste stomach acid in the back of your throat. A contraction -- your throat pumps a little something from your stomach and into your mouth. You're forced to swallow, just to keep looking...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "*Reservoirs*? No -- but do they tak..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Reservoirs*? No -- but do they take obscure trivia and odd titbits?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Like a toxicology screening?" He l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Like a toxicology screening?" He looks at the monster. "At this stage, I doubt Processing will find anything, even if he was brimming with cocaine. But still... you should add a request."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Leave it *N/A* then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Leave it *N/A* then."

fields.Title: You: "Write it down, omit the *voil*!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down, omit the *voil*!

fields.Title: You: ""Hmh..." (Try to understand what th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hmh..." (Try to understand what the lieutenant has written about the case at hand.)

fields.Title: You: ""1. Bite marks.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "1. Bite marks."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That was not a team effort. I just..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That was not a team effort. I just *missed* my shot. Also, let's not mention it. Muddies the water."

fields.Title: You: ""A: Opinion -- fatal injury.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A: Opinion -- fatal injury."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it's..." He's expecting for y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, it's..." He's expecting for you to finish the sentence.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: You: ""A: Opinion -- fatal injury.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A: Opinion -- fatal injury."

fields.Title: You: ""There is no reason. It's just a ra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There is no reason. It's just a random guess."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""At least for the time being." He n..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "At least for the time being." He nods. "If we don't like it, I can always amend this later. In my paperwork."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Lividity is consistent with hangin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Lividity is consistent with hanging. The head is congested. Contusions are present on the head, chest, and thighs -- consistent with stones thrown postmortem; low velocity..."
fields.Alternate1: "Lividity is consistent with *hanging* -- albeit *faint*, as noted. The head is congested. Contusions are present on the head, chest, and thighs -- consistent with stones thrown postmortem; low velocity..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now, you see -- that worries me."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now, you see -- that worries me." He wipes his forehead. "You will die if you drink -- you know that, don't you? You're proving a useful detective, the organization would miss you."

fields.Title: You: ""Perhaps a drink is in order -- lat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Perhaps a drink is in order -- later, I mean?"

fields.Title: You: ""What if we *missed* something as a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What if we *missed* something as a result?"

fields.Title: Interfacing: "For a fraction of a second you feel..."
fields.Dialogue Text: For a fraction of a second you feel something. An irregularity -- but then it's gone, too minute to register in your mind.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Here," he hands you the chaincutte..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Here," he hands you the chaincutters back and then kneels closer to the body -- running his finger along the dark red groove. Until he comes to a gap...

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Shoot, Loonie Roonie!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Shoot, Loonie Roonie!

fields.Title: You: ""Do we need a scalpel for it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Do we need a scalpel for it?"

fields.Title: You: ""4. Date of birth." (Nod.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "4. Date of birth." (Nod.)

fields.Title: Jump to: [Composure: "Your central nervous system recogni..."]
Logic: "Yeah, we got this. We're *smart*."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah, we got this. We're *smart*.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's work off yours for now.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's work off yours for now."

fields.Title: You: ""3. Name:""
fields.Dialogue Text: "3. Name:"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Naively, the lieutenant does not do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Naively, the lieutenant does not double check your notes.

fields.Title: You: ""11. Evidence of treatment:""
fields.Dialogue Text: "11. Evidence of treatment:"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""None -- at least not after the ini..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "None -- at least not after the initial examination."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "As you read it you think: that leav..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you read it you think: that leaves out dark haired Mesque, Sao, Saramirizian, Kedreatic.... Lighter skinned Occidental means this man could be... Vespertine? Oranjese? Messinian. Those three are on the table.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Also of note -- your unconscious ra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Also of note -- your unconscious racial profiling machine ruled out Messinian before. Despite all the *copporoonies* and *cobos*. That leaves Vespertine or Oranjese. Continue.

fields.Title: Drama: "It would be *clever* of you to omit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It would be *clever* of you to omit the boots altogether, sire. If you are to *keep* them for yourself -- as you ought to. You have deserved them more than anyone else!

fields.Title: You: ""I wanted to see what happens if I..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I wanted to see what happens if I say it *wrong*."

fields.Title: Empathy: "There-there dead man, you were some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There-there dead man, you were someone's child. It's all over now.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's no use. We should get *chainc..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's no use. We should get *chaincutters* -- you can try with them. I have a pair in the toolbox of my Kineema."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm." He shows you the point on th..."]
You: "Enough, cut some!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Enough, cut some!

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "Bullets have bitten little pieces o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Bullets have bitten little pieces out of him. It must have been excruciating, especially the hip... Before you is a temple of pain that knew little tenderness in life.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hands are clean." He inspects the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hands are clean." He inspects the wrist. "No sign of a recent struggle."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The hand is surprisingly heavy to l..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The hand is surprisingly heavy to lift, filled with decay liquids. Feels as though it could explode, if squeezed harder. You're suddenly repulsed -- so much so you feel compelled to drop it.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "I'm only fucking with you! I know w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I'm only fucking with you! I know where you're from -- from Coppodocia! And your name is *Il Cobo*. What can I do you for, Il Cobo di Coppodocia?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hands are clean," the lieutenant c..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hands are clean," the lieutenant concludes. The dead man's fingers slip from your hand, cold and sausage-like. "No sign of injury from struggling."

fields.Title: You: ""Nope." Write: N/A."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Nope." Write: N/A.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Respiratory system..." Back hunche..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Respiratory system..." Back hunched -- as if in prayer -- he begins to pry open the dead man's jaws. He stops to exert more force. Both hands are used.

fields.Title: You: ""And that's it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "And that's it?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Same for toxicology and serology -..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Same for toxicology and serology - N/A."

fields.Title: You: ""Ha... no." (Search for something a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha... no." (Search for something about *you*.)

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Their strike, if allowed to escalat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Their strike, if allowed to escalate into violence, adds to a growing sense of civil war in the city. He's extremely neutral, even in his notes, but avoiding this escalation is Kim's primary concern when dealing with the situation in Martinaise.

fields.Title: You: ""I'll put it down as fatal.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'll put it down as fatal."

fields.Title: Authority: "He's tired and weary and you are be..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's tired and weary and you are better not to test his patience.

fields.Title: You: ""I arrived at this conclusion throu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I arrived at this conclusion through the *psychic arts*."

fields.Title: You: ""There's something in me that tells..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There's something in me that tells me to be sceptical of appearances here. The footprints were too perfect."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Most everything *else* on the vict..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Most everything *else* on the victim says otherwise..." He pauses. "But I agree. I was ready to establish a cause of death here, officer, but now I think we should leave it empty. At least for the time being."

fields.Title: You: "Search the body *one more time*, th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Search the body *one more time*, thoroughly.
fields.tooltip2: Need reason to pull head off.
fields.tooltip6: Felt a little bump on the head.
fields.tooltip9: Two officers must be present to conduct a field autopsy.
fields.tooltip10: Knows there's a bullet in there.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsKimHere()  and  Variable["yard.hanged_perc_white_found"]  and  Variable["whirling.kim_took_away_body_day_2"] == false  and   Variable["yard.hanged_perc_white_failure_actually_success"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""First, what exactly is a *field au..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "First, what exactly is a *field autopsy*?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unhygienically?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Unhygienically?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can give you my paperwork -- the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can give you my paperwork -- there's an autopsy form there. Several actually. But *only* if it helps move things along."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "The trash container. THE TRASH CONT..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The trash container. THE TRASH CONTAINER OF BAD MEMORIES.

fields.Title: You: "Open your ledger at the field autop..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Open your ledger at the field autopsy form.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsKimHere()  and  (Variable["yard.hanged_autopsy_form_ready"] == true  or  (Variable["yard.need_paperwork_for_autopsy"]  and  Variable["TASK.find_your_paperwork_done"]))  and  Variable["yard.hanged_autopsy_ain_hub_reached"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""Great job, wise race mentor.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Great job, wise race mentor."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't think I'm a detective.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think I'm a detective."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No. You and I are *detectives*. Th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No. You and I are *detectives*. The honorary rank of 'detective' signifies our ability to handle *the entire incident chain* -- from autopsy to clean-up, to social work. Everything."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "You got just the right tool for tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You got just the right tool for that -- the chaincutters.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not from where I look, no. But you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Not from where I look, no. But you're right. Your hunch was right. He was having sex when he died."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...is what it would look like, but..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...is what it would look like, but we know better. We *know* the ligature mark is a treatment." He awaits your call.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "As it ought to. This is where its g..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As it ought to. This is where its grip on the curdled meat is gentlest, pulling up...

fields.Title: You: ""I haven't lost this satin shirt."..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I haven't lost this satin shirt." (Smell your armpit.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I hope we do." He covers his nose...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I hope we do." He covers his nose. "It's getting *really* late for an autopsy..."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Fair to olive skinned, from the iso..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fair to olive skinned, from the isola of Mundi. This is as vague as it gets. You might as well say: white-ish.

fields.Title: You: "Write: The Gloaming."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: The Gloaming.

fields.Title: You: ""Agreed -- no treatment.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Agreed -- no treatment."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "A silent nod. The lieutenant places..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A silent nod. The lieutenant places his gloved hand on the corpse's chest -- as if in preparation...

fields.Title: Composure: "Your central nervous system recogni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Your central nervous system recognizes this gesture. It's the *Stations of the Breath* -- ecclesiastic, religious in nature. A holdout from Pre-Dolorian burial rites. It takes him two seconds to perform, then...

fields.Title: You: ""A light-hearted jest -- locker roo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A light-hearted jest -- locker room banter. Boys will be boys."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- and now this happened. I am..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes -- and now this happened. I am perplexed. Officer, please write down the right serial number: E50.100.1000."

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The deceased has a steel reinforce..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The deceased has a steel reinforced cargo belt around his neck, tied with a hangman's knot. Colour -- yellow; length -- three metres. There is a buckle on the other end."
fields.Alternate1: "The deceased has a cargo lashing belt around his neck, tied with a hangman's knot. Colour -- yellow; length -- three metres. There is a buckle on the other end."
fields.Alternate2: "The deceased has a cargo lashing belt around his neck, tied with a hangman's knot. Colour -- yellow; length -- three metres. *Vermillion spirits* is printed on the side."
fields.Alternate3: "The deceased has a belt for airlifting cargo around his neck, tied with a hangman's knot. Colour -- yellow; length -- three metres. There is a buckle on the other end."
fields.Alternate4: "The deceased has a belt for airlifting cargo around his neck, tied with a hangman's knot. Colour -- yellow; length -- three metres. *Vermillion spirits* is printed on the side."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "The knot is the weak spot. The chai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The knot is the weak spot. The chaincutters fit in there. Steady now, like a flower arranger -- two cuts and it should come loose.

fields.Title: You: "Press down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Press down...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He sinks the cutters into the knot,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He sinks the cutters into the knot, preparing to perform the cuts -- with his elbow to his knee for precision.

fields.Title: You: "Touch it."
fields.Dialogue Text: Touch it.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Doesn't feel like anything. A cold..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Doesn't feel like anything. A cold spot under your gardening gloves, unremarkable and un-alive.

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Ya pig's pretty sick, I gotta say...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ya pig's pretty sick, I gotta say..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In addition, I see smaller, residu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "In addition, I see smaller, residual scars -- too numerous to count, covering about 30% of his skin."

fields.Title: You: "My name is..."
fields.Dialogue Text: My name is...

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "*Hepato-* means liver and *-biliary..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Hepato-* means liver and *-biliary* the gallbladder and bile ducts.

fields.Title: You: ""The completionist in me wonders if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The completionist in me wonders if there's something we could still do..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "And 'the 41st' comes off as a moder..."
fields.Dialogue Text: And 'the 41st' comes off as a moderately competent detective.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, I'm Cuno's pig. I agree.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, I'm Cuno's pig. I agree."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Well. We established probable caus..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Well. We established probable cause of death -- some would say that's the *goal* of an autopsy."

fields.Title: You: "[Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A scalpel is not always required...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A scalpel is not always required. I hope this is one of those cases... Latex gloves are, however."

fields.Title: You: ""Alright.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "A trash container. Yellow and capsu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A trash container. Yellow and capsule-like, lying in the corner of the yard.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Document A1. The detectives have t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Document A1. The detectives have taken a colour photograph of the markings. Photograph was produced on scene."

fields.Title: You: ""Wait -- honorary rank of detective?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Wait -- honorary rank of detective?"

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Mute silence as always."
fields.Dialogue Text: Mute silence as always.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes, let's do it tomorrow." [Leave..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, let's do it tomorrow." [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The boots were ceramic, vitreous e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The boots were ceramic, vitreous enamel. They were fused to his skin from blood flowing downward postmortem. They were removed postmortem by scavengers."
fields.Alternate1: "The rest of the clothes have been removed postmortem by scavengers. In order to get to the ceramic armour. Officers are in search of the missing pieces."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should find it before someone e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We should find it before someone else does, then hurry back to the autopsy as soon as possible."

fields.Title: You: ""I have no idea.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I have no idea."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He places his gloved hand on the de..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He places his gloved hand on the dead man's chest, as if in preparation...

fields.Title: Jump to: [The Hanged Man: "The corpse cannot feel Kim's hand o..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's quite possible. You lied to m..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's quite possible. You lied to me for no good reason. Please write down the right serial number: E50.100.1000."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "The spine is bent more than the lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The spine is bent more than the lieutenant compensated for. This buster's actual height is about 1.85. And no, you could not take him *straight on*.

fields.Title: You: "Cut the belt off."
fields.Dialogue Text: Cut the belt off.

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""No he ain't." C looks blas. "Your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No he ain't." C looks blas. "Your pig's a boring fuck."

fields.Title: Volition: "Concentrate on the belt, not on who..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Concentrate on the belt, not on who is  whose pig. There is no pig. There are only the chaincutters -- and the belt.

fields.Title: You: ""Were we expecting any?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Were we expecting any?"

fields.Title: Conceptualization: "Of course: there is a moral to be d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course: there is a moral to be drawn from it -- a moral to this story!

fields.Title: You: "Look inside the dead man's mouth."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look inside the dead man's mouth.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "THERE ARE ANCIENT MYSTERIES DOWN TH..."
fields.Dialogue Text: THERE ARE ANCIENT MYSTERIES DOWN THERE, COBO... ASK ME LATER.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Gastrointestinal," he breathes a s..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Gastrointestinal," he breathes a sigh of approaching relief -- this is the last field on the list. He looks around -- to the ground, the pool of faeces there...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "It's not a glowing review, sorry to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not a glowing review, sorry to say. 'The 41st' -- as you're referred to -- comes across as somewhat less than competent. It's not *explicitly* stated that the lieutenant doesn't trust you, there's just... nothing positive in there.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A dark red abraded ligature mark e..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "A dark red abraded ligature mark encircling the neck, with a gap on the nape measuring... let's say seven centimetres. The hyoid bone is fractured, the cervical column intact."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, it's not a fatal injury then.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, it's not a fatal injury then."

fields.Title: You: ""I don't like this game.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't like this game."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't."
