fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Still... there may be truth to thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Still... there may be truth to this one. I was ready to call a probable cause of death here -- but now I think we should leave it empty. At least for the time being."

fields.Title: Volition: "Being Cuno's pig has a steadying ef..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Being Cuno's pig has a steadying effect on your hand. Go with the flow, man...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He raises a finger: "It is the *int..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He raises a finger: "It is the *intended* order. Anyway..."

fields.Title: You: ""What now?" (Conclude.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "What now?" (Conclude.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant adjusts his glasses..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant adjusts his glasses and takes a deep breath.

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""It's okay to cry, *runkkari*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's okay to cry, *runkkari*."

fields.Title: You: ""Beautiful." (Wipe a tear from your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Beautiful." (Wipe a tear from your eye.)

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Cops gonna cut his shit up.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Cops gonna cut his shit up."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That's it. Field autopsy done, det..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it. Field autopsy done, detective. All that remains is to see if the alleged cause of death -- the bullet -- is truly lodged in his brain. I'll leave that to you, colleague. *Or* to Processing -- I won't force you in there..."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "A strange word... *treatment*."
fields.Dialogue Text: A strange word... *treatment*.

fields.Title: You: "Stroke his hair -- gently."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stroke his hair -- gently.

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, Kim. Take him away." (The li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, Kim. Take him away." (The lieutenant takes the body away -- work alone for the rest of the day.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, you see..." He points to the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, you see..." He points to the bright red pages at the end. "The field autopsy form is the one on red copier paper."

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Fucking *runkkari*! He's afraid to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking *runkkari*! He's afraid to say it!"

fields.Title: You: ""I still have my disco trousers." (..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I still have my disco trousers." (Look at your pants.)

fields.Title: You: "(Begin.) "1. Assistant:""
fields.Dialogue Text: (Begin.) "1. Assistant:"

fields.Title: You: "Write: Tequila Sunset."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: Tequila Sunset.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Try 40. The damage is so extensive..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Try 40. The damage is so extensive it's better to err on the young side.

fields.Title: You: ""What happens now?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What happens now?"

fields.Title: You: "Rotate some more!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Rotate some more!

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, fuck him! FUCK THAT FGRI!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, fuck him! FUCK THAT FGRI! Corpse fucking time!"

fields.Title: You: "Let him work."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let him work.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Last item -- hands." He takes the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Last item -- hands." He takes the man's right hand in his, inspects it -- then moves on to the other hand...

fields.Title: You: ""What the...""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What the..."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Inside you see darkness. Just a mes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inside you see darkness. Just a mess of meat and darkness.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Haemorrhaging present in mucous,"..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Haemorrhaging present in mucous," the lieutenant repeats impatiently. He lets go of the jaws. The mouth snaps shut before you.

fields.Title: You: ""Right. Let's keep the drug screeni..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. Let's keep the drug screening then. More info there."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh?" He looks incredulous: "So *we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oh?" He looks incredulous: "So *we* inflicted them?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Injuries," he nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Injuries," he nods.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So -- the scalp bleeds from a post..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "So -- the scalp bleeds from a postmortem head injury. A stone. The injury does not have the rim of an early inflammatory response. A perpetrator on the scene has confessed to causing it postmortem..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Has confessed to causing it *at ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Has confessed to causing it *at maximum velocity*."

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Think for a moment. There's time, d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Think for a moment. There's time, don't rush.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "KK57-0503-0815 listens, motionless..."
fields.Dialogue Text: KK57-0503-0815 listens, motionless -- with the cargo belt still around his neck. Only one box remains:
fields.Alternate1: HDB41-0803.1111 listens, motionless -- with the cargo belt still around his neck. Only one box remains:
fields.Alternate2: HDB41-0803.1015 listens, motionless -- with the cargo belt still around his neck. Only one box remains:
fields.Alternate3: HDB41-0803.1300 listens, motionless -- with the cargo belt still around his neck. Only one box remains:
fields.Alternate4: HDB41-0803 listens, motionless -- with the cargo belt still around his neck. Only one box remains:

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We were thorough with the list of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We were thorough with the list of injuries too -- we described them all in detail. What is there to say? Given the circumstances, it was a professional field autopsy."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""To be honest, we were sloppy with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "To be honest, we were sloppy with the injuries. The victim has bite marks and contusions. We should have described them in detail, provided an opinion. But what's done is done -- and they're clearly not fatal."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We don't always have to be so *ori..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We don't always have to be so *original* about everything. Anyway..."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "What was what? Brilliantine? There'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What was what? Brilliantine? There's brilliantine in his hair.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Also numerous residual scars, cove..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Also numerous residual scars, covering about 40% of his skin. Extensive scarring, to say the least." He coughs. "Hands were clean, no sign of injury from struggling. That's about it."

fields.Title: Jump to: [You: ""Tell me, who are you, dead man?""]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""There truly is a time for everythi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "There truly is a time for everything -- even for yellow gardening gloves." He nods approvingly. "However, they are lacking hygienically. I suggest you *get in there* in limited capacity."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): ""I should have just brought a dicta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I should have just brought a dictaphone," he mumbles.

fields.Title: You: ""A field *autopsy*?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "A field *autopsy*?"

fields.Title: You: ""Got it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Got it."

fields.Title: Endurance: "Teeming with opportunistic micro-or..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Teeming with opportunistic micro-organisms, letting out a foul-smelling diamine compound. Your eyes turn watery...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fortunately we already wrote down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fortunately we already wrote down the serial number -- E50.100.1000. Let's move on."

fields.Title: You: "Keep nodding."
fields.Dialogue Text: Keep nodding.

fields.Title: You: ""I still have my trusty blazer. It..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I still have my trusty blazer. It is yet to abandon me -- like everything else."

fields.Title: You: ""We just fill this in, right?" (Sho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We just fill this in, right?" (Show him the red *field autopsy form* in your ledger.)

fields.Title: Empathy: "The lieutenant is quite surprised y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is quite surprised you managed to come up with an adequate case number.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Pig's messed up. Cuno feels pity.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pig's messed up. Cuno feels pity."

fields.Title: You: ""I'm going to write 1.85 metres lie..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm going to write 1.85 metres lieutenant."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Body hair is light brown, distribu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Body hair is light brown, distribution is consistent with age." He kneels in to get a better look: "The deceased had male pattern baldness. Hair is combed back, short."

fields.Title: You: "Write it down: Short, light brown,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down: Short, light brown, male pattern baldness.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "His hair feels wet, soaked with rai..."
fields.Dialogue Text: His hair feels wet, soaked with rain, cold to touch. Not that different from a living person -- after a swim.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm," he coughs. "Lividity is cons..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Khm," he coughs. "Lividity is consistent with *hanging*. The head is congested. Contusions are present on the head, chest, and thighs -- consistent with stones thrown; low velocity..."
fields.Alternate1: "Khm," he coughs. "Lividity is consistent with hanging -- albeit *faint*, as noted. The head is congested. Contusions are present on the head, chest, and thighs -- indicating stones thrown; low velocity..."

fields.Title: You: "Look for a good spot to cut."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look for a good spot to cut.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "*Snap!* The knot is slashed. Anothe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Snap!* The knot is slashed. Another cut and the belt falls apart like a flower bouquet, revealing the dead man's neck -- and the dark red ligature mark around it.

fields.Title: You: "Inspect the genitals."
fields.Dialogue Text: Inspect the genitals.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Doesn't feel like anything. Just co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Doesn't feel like anything. Just cold flesh under your finger, unremarkable and un-alive.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The dead man looks too, with barely..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The dead man looks too, with barely contained excitement to hear the moral of his story.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "From here it looks as though the cl..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From here it looks as though the clown-faced man is screaming. The tendons of his jaw are torn apart, hyoid ripped from the force of the lieutenant's hands.

fields.Title: Pain Threshold: "No, you don't. You can keep it in...."
fields.Dialogue Text: No, you don't. You can keep it in. You can keep *anything* in.

fields.Title: You: ""Would obscure titbits and odd triv..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Would obscure titbits and odd trivia fit the fields?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We only have one test, as per regu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We only have one test, as per regulation -- and we already requested semen."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What's next on the list?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's next on the list?"

fields.Title: You: "What?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What?

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""So, where were we on this?""]
You: "And what?"
fields.Dialogue Text: And what?

fields.Title: You: ""What about the injuries *we* have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What about the injuries *we* have inflicted?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Be pedantic, if you like -- it doe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Be pedantic, if you like -- it doesn't matter. No one else is going to investigate this man's murder. And if they *do*, such details would only *confuse* them."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fatal injury by seagulls?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fatal injury by seagulls?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Agreed -- next injury?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Agreed -- next injury?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, he was not murdered by seagull..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, he was not murdered by seagulls."

fields.Title: You: ""B: Non-fatal, post-mortem.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "B: Non-fatal, post-mortem."

fields.Title: Empathy: "He is deep in thought, eyes fixed o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He is deep in thought, eyes fixed on the bright red ring around the dead man's neck.

fields.Title: Shivers: "YOU WERE."
fields.Dialogue Text: YOU WERE.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did you?" His eyes narrow. "I'm no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Did you?" His eyes narrow. "I'm not so sure. I *thought* we could establish the cause of death here, officer. Now I think we should leave it empty."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...for processing." He looks at th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...for processing." He looks at the dead man one more time, then at the slip of red paper in his hand, then at the corpse again.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I need a copy of that autopsy form..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I need a copy of that autopsy form, then I will drive him to Faubourg..."

fields.Title: You: "Write: 'pigs gonna have sex'."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: 'pigs gonna have sex'.

fields.Title: You: ""Everything! Here I stand -- comple..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everything! Here I stand -- completely topless, assaulted by the elements!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright. Bitemarks, contusions on..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Alright. Bitemarks, contusions on head and chest, and a ligature mark encircling the neck."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The rope rises to a point," he say..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The rope rises to a point," he says, "leaving a *gap* in the ligature mark. The suspension point is in the back of the neck, on the nape."

fields.Title: You: ""3. Description of injuries -- now..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "3. Description of injuries -- now that we've fully examined the body."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: Variable["TASK.perform_field_autopsy_done"] == false  and  IsKimHere()   and  (Variable["yard.hanged_injury_hub_both_first"] == true  and  Variable["yard.hanged_wounds_ligature"] == true  and  Variable["yard.hanged_wounds_ligature_hyoid"] == true  and  Variable["yard.hanged_second_branch_done_in_autopsy"] == true)  and  Variable["yard.hanged_injury_hub_reached"] == false

fields.Title: You: ""Maybe.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "As you say the words you find yours..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As you say the words you find yourself peering from the corner of your eye... to where? To the West!

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mr. Measurehead has done a good jo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mr. Measurehead has done a good job." The lieutenant nods approvingly. "Nothing is *too* broken -- or compromised. The victim is ready for a field autopsy."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's not about cutting..." He squi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not about cutting..." He squints at the corpse. "And no -- you and I are *detectives*. The honorary rank of 'detective' signifies our ability to handle *the entire incident chain* -- from autopsy to clean-up. To social work..."

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. *Interview*. We can always do..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. *Interview*. We can always do the *autopsy* later." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""Okay. 1. Assistant:""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay. 1. Assistant:"

fields.Title: You: "Oh, yeah -- I'm *prepared*. (Pet th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, yeah -- I'm *prepared*. (Pet the chaincutters.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hm." The lieutenant furrows his br..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hm." The lieutenant furrows his brow. "Not just yet -- let's get what we know *it isn't* out of the way first."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm..." The lieutenant scratches t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Khm..." The lieutenant scratches the back of his head. "We already did that. Remember? We started, but we need the *chaincutters* from my motor-carriage to finish it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You've lost your paperwork, haven'..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You've lost your paperwork, haven't you?"

fields.Title: You:"Write the initials: H.D.B."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write the initials: H.D.B.

fields.Title: Drama: "10:15. It's understated."
fields.Dialogue Text: 10:15. It's understated.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good. Let's go with that.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. Let's go with that."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Pigs gonna have sex?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pigs gonna have sex?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We're still going with March 4th,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We're still going with March 4th, '51."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""They'd *have* to have incapacitate..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "They'd *have* to have incapacitated and carried him over -- this man was more than a match for untrained dockworkers." He places his hand on the dead man's chest, as if in preparation...

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "There must be brilliantine in there..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There must be brilliantine in there. He's combed his hair back with oil.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The belt is equally tight around th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The belt is equally tight around the whole circumference of his neck, swelling over the edges like white bread, rising from the yeast.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""His head, yes -- you were about to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "His head, yes -- you were about to cut off his head." He sinks the cutters into the knot, preparing to perform the cuts -- with his elbow to his knee for precision.

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "From wounds sustained over two, may..."
fields.Dialogue Text: From wounds sustained over two, maybe more decades. Dispersal and accumulation indicates long and active combat duty.

fields.Title: You: "Pick up the hand."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pick up the hand.

fields.Title: You: "Nothing. I got nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing. I got nothing.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "You *get* me, Cobo. I feel like you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You *get* me, Cobo. I feel like you were once for tenderness and kisses yourself... but then shit went *south* and now you're ahead of even me on the pain front!

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""I'm not even interested in these b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not even interested in these boring *mulkkus* anymore. Haven't sucked him off or anything..."

fields.Title: You: ""Ha." (Check out THE MAN WITH THE H..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Ha." (Check out THE MAN WITH THE HOLE IN HIS HEAD.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You're probably imagining it -- the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You're probably imagining it -- the notes are *very* hard to decipher at a glance -- so don't draw any conclusions from this, but...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, it's not.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, it's not."

fields.Title: You: ""First. How did it go?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "First. How did it go?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at the dead ma..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant looks at the dead man one more time -- then at his notebook, then at the corpse again...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Always good to think ahead. Now......"
fields.Dialogue Text: "Always good to think ahead. Now..." He points to the rope squeezing the dead man's neck.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Good call! Never mind that *old tra..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good call! Never mind that *old trash container* lurching in the corner of this yard, full of  old news...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""An honour -- and a burden -- attac..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "An honour -- and a burden -- attached to your rank once you've proven yourself able, usually after five to eight years of field work. Mine is *lieutenant-detective*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good..." The lieutenant falls sile..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good..." The lieutenant falls silent. He places his gloved hand on the corpse's chest, as if in preparation...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""...that he was dead. Yes. They mov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "...that he was dead. Yes. They moved fast. This is a good treatment."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Honestly, I'm not sure there *were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly, I'm not sure there *weren't* marks on his wrists. That part got blurry for me. The *stench...*" He covers his mouth. "But you're right. There should be signs of struggle. Let's leave the cause of death empty for the time being."

fields.Title: You: "Let him move on."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let him move on.

fields.Title: You: ""Yes. I've lost it.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes. I've lost it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I've noticed that, yes. And I must..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I've noticed that, yes. And I must say I find it *troubling*." He looks at his notebook and sighs.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods."
fields.Dialogue Text: He nods.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not so sure.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not so sure."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "There's brilliantine in there. He's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's brilliantine in there. He's combed his hair back with oil.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant pays no heed. "In ad..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant pays no heed. "In addition, there are bitemarks on the face, scalp, and chest. Consistent with predation."
fields.Alternate1: "In addition there are contusion marks on the face, scalp, and chest. Consistent with predation." He remarks to you: "We have those now, for part 3."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We need to cut the belt to see the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We need to cut the belt to see the ligature mark below. Carefully -- with as much *precision* as you can."

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""I fuckin' knew it!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I fuckin' knew it!"

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Pleased to meet you. Where are you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pleased to meet you. Where are you from and what's your name?

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "That you have, Cobo, that you have!..."
fields.Dialogue Text: That you have, Cobo, that you have! We're real tight that way. In that special, special way...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Central nervous system," he says a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Central nervous system," he says and then concludes abruptly: "I have nothing. Do you have anything on this man's central nervous system?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oral cavity shows no lesions. The..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Oral cavity shows no lesions. The victim has received dental implants, possibly after a combat wound. Mouth swollen, haemorrhaging present in mucose of the lips and mouth."

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "No scream, no sigh of relief rises..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No scream, no sigh of relief rises from the darkness inside. It's humid there, sickly sweet air unlike anything living. You feel like throwing up, straight in that mouth...
fields.Alternate1: No scream, no sigh of relief rises from the darkness inside. It's humid there, sickly sweet air unlike anything living. You feel like you're about to throw up again, straight in that mouth of his...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unless you have untapped reservoir..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Unless you have untapped reservoirs of knowledge there?"

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "It's not spelled out explicitly, bu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's not spelled out explicitly, but the lieutenant fears a tear is forming between the liberal-moralist establishment of Revachol -- and her populist citizenry. This populist force, a pot pourri of far right and left, is exemplified in the Dbardeurs' Union.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean the spin-stabilized munit..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean the spin-stabilized munition from a Kiejl A9/90 muzzleloader lodged in his lung?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We need to check the hyoid bone fo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We need to check the hyoid bone for damage before we can sign off on this. It's a potential fatal injury... Let's do part 2, external examination and then return."

fields.Title: Shivers: "Higher yet, Coalition airships guar..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Higher yet, Coalition airships guard over the twenty one cordons of the Zone of Control. The air is criss-crossed with radio transmissions, the hair on your neck rises...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Everything that's physically on th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Everything that's physically on the victim says otherwise -- but I agree. I was ready to establish a cause of death, officer -- now I think we should leave it empty. At least for the time being."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: "He produces a small black plastic r..."]
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Honestly, I'm not sure there *were..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Honestly, I'm not sure there *weren't* marks on his wrists. That part got blurry for me. The *stench...*" He covers his mouth. "But you're right. I was ready to call this -- now I think we should leave it empty. At least for the time being."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm afraid we can't continue befor..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm afraid we can't continue before we've gone through both the external *and* internal examination first. Thoroughly."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Unfortunately, no.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Unfortunately, no."

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "As the words leave your mouth -- th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: As the words leave your mouth -- there it is again! That strange feeling, like there's something *in* there...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""If we must, then we must. Police p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "If we must, then we must. Police paperwork is confidential material, officer..." He sighs.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You are. Your station would not ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You are. Your station would not have assigned you on this case if you weren't. Now..."
fields.Alternate1: "You are. Your station would not have assigned you on this case if you weren't. Now, the way I see it..." He looks at the corpse with some disgust...

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The hanged man lets out a joyous li..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The hanged man lets out a joyous little bubble of rot from his nose...

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Talkin' about sex. He's gonna suck..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Talkin' about sex. He's gonna suck him off now, I know it..."

fields.Title: Interfacing: "...still, you can make out a case w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: ...still, you can make out a case with a curious title: THE MAN WITH THE HOLE IN HIS HEAD.

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing, just nod."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing, just nod.

fields.Title: You: ""My left shoe! I don't know where t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My left shoe! I don't know where the right one is, though..." (Look at your shoe.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No need to be melodramatic, office..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No need to be melodramatic, officer." He looks at his blue notebook and sighs.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, lets get back to this later...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, lets get back to this later." [Leave.]

fields.Title: You: ""2. Internal examination -- summary.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "2. Internal examination -- summary."

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: IsKimHere()  and   Variable["yard.hanged_autopsy_ain_hub_reached"] == true  and  Variable["yard.hanged_autopsy_reached_exterior_hub"] == false  and  Variable["yard.hanged_autopsy_internal_finished"] == false

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "You stand there with the ledger ope..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You stand there with the ledger open like a lonesome idiot, realizing you have no idea how to conduct an autopsy without the lieutenant, who is out there doing something immeasurably serious.

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Lets say 13:00 -- a good time to st..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Lets say 13:00 -- a good time to start drinking.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mondial.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mondial."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What else?" He looks over your sho..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What else?" He looks over your shoulder. "*9. Body identified by* is non-applicable. *10. Case number* is the same as the coroner's case."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Then again -- the right lividity i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Then again -- the right lividity is easy to produce, if you know what you're doing." He places his hand on the dead man's chest, as if in preparation...

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "A solid guess, Mr. Racial Profiler!"
fields.Dialogue Text: A solid guess, Mr. Racial Profiler!

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: You: ""Does it look like he was *enjoying..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Does it look like he was *enjoying* his moment of death?"

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Thank you for lightening his mood...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Thank you for lightening his mood. It's hard down there.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Respiratory system," he pries the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Respiratory system," he pries the corpse's mouth back open. "Put it down as -- oral cavity shows no lesions, mouth swollen, haemorrhaging present in mucous of the lips and mouth."

fields.Title: You: "Write: N/A and add *toxicology requ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: N/A and add *toxicology requested*.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Odd. There doesn't seem to be much..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Odd. There doesn't seem to be much about *you* in his notes. As if *you* aren't the sun around which the world revolves? Could it be that the case is not *about* you?

fields.Title: You: "(Keep it minimal.) "So -- back to i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: (Keep it minimal.) "So -- back to injuries?"

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Why don't you fuck them if you lov..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why don't you fuck them if you love them so much?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I see haemorrhaging on the skin ab..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I see haemorrhaging on the skin above and below the ligature mark. Depth of the mark -- one centimetre. No signs of clawing on the neck."

fields.Title: You: ""I agree.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I agree."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It was a..." He looks for the righ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It was a..." He looks for the right words. "An irregular field autopsy. We did not establish cause of death, which is supposed to be the goal of an autopsy. But... *personally*, I do not see this as a parameter for success."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We weren't *too* sloppy with the i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We weren't *too* sloppy with the injuries. We did not describe the bitemarks. We should have provided an opinion there. But, given the circumstances -- it is excusable. They were clearly not fatal."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We requested a test to be run on t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We requested a test to be run on the genitals -- that was *de rgle*. The results should arrive in a couple of weeks, if we're lucky. I would not hold my breath..."

fields.Title: You: ""Why weren't his hands tied? A big..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Why weren't his hands tied? A big man like this -- I would tie his hands when marching him to the gallows?"
fields.Alternate1: "Why didn't he claw at his neck when they hanged him? And why did they not tie his hands? A big man like this is dangerous."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "What you *do* know is: at 18.9 km,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What you *do* know is: at 18.9 km, the dormant shield volcano *Corpus Mundi* is the world's highest summit; and the failure of the '38 single 'Et Puis Du Sang' to crack the Top 20 was the death knell of disco. But -- what a *field autopsy* is? You have no idea.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I suggest *I* handle the physical..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I suggest *I* handle the physical part of the autopsy -- and you take notes."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The assistant has a colour photogr..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The assistant has a colour photograph of the markings -- to be added to the case files as document A1. The photo is taken on the scene, using a Trigat Mini."

fields.Title: Jump to: [Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tattoos." He stands up, feet plant..."]
Cunoesse: ""That was some sick shit, *sekop*.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "That was some sick shit, *sekop*."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "He's really *doing* it -- the dead..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's really *doing* it -- the dead man's teeth cut into his gloved hands.

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Now they only have one paperwork t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now they only have one paperwork too..."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Right. The autopsy form is near th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Right. The autopsy form is near the end." He hands you his notebook and his pen.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The pudgy mess looks neither *Mondi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The pudgy mess looks neither *Mondial* nor *Occidental*. It doesn't even look human. The next line says:

fields.Title: You: ""What exactly *is* treatment anyway?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What exactly *is* treatment anyway?"

fields.Title: You: ""What's next?" (No opinion.)"
fields.Dialogue Text: "What's next?" (No opinion.)

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I fail to see *any* humour in it...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I fail to see *any* humour in it. Officer, please write down the right serial number: E50.100.1000."

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "You jam the cutters right under the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You jam the cutters right under the knot -- that seems like a smart idea. Yeah, *somewhere there*. Already they're buried deep in the man's flesh. Then you rotate them to get a better hold. Then...

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is unaware of what's..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant is unaware of what's happening in your head and why you're touching it. He merely expects you to write down his notes on the man's genitalia so you can move on.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The hand feels heavy, filled with d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The hand feels heavy, filled with decay liquids. Like it's ready to explode, if squeezed hard enough. You're suddenly repulsed -- so much so you feel compelled to drop it.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What would that be?" He looks at y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What would that be?" He looks at you inquisitively.

fields.Title: Cunoesse: ""Yeah, jack that fucker off!""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, jack that fucker off!"

fields.Title: You: "Look deeper inside."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look deeper inside.

fields.Title: You: ""I don't think so.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't think so."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Pigs requestin' semen like it's no..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Pigs requestin' semen like it's no big deal."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Add a request then. We'll know if..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Add a request then. We'll know if drugs or poisons remain in his blood..." He looks at the monster. "At this stage, I doubt Processing will find anything, even if he was *brimming* with it."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""So, where were we on this?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "So, where were we on this?"

fields.Title: You: ""But... isn't that sloppy?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "But... isn't that sloppy?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You mean the incision on the thora..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You mean the incision on the thorax, from a chaincutter? That was not a team effort. And I wouldn't mention it. Muddies the waters."

fields.Title: You: ""I just took a whack in the dark.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I just took a whack in the dark."

fields.Title: You: ""I can't shake the feeling he was d..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I can't shake the feeling he was doing something *else* when he died."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now you're just undermining yourse..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now you're just undermining yourself for the sake of it. What's *strange* is -- I agree. I was sure we had our cause of death here, and now I think we should leave it empty. At least for the time being..."

fields.Title: You: ""What now?" (Give him back his note..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What now?" (Give him back his notebook.)

fields.Title: Composure: "You tilt your head, also looking at..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You tilt your head, also looking at the corpse.

fields.Title: You: ""None of your business, Kim. Lay of..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "None of your business, Kim. Lay off my case."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I guess you've got to start findin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I guess you've got to start finding at least *some* of the things you've lost, before they hurt someone..." He sighs.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The corpse lies on the ground among..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The corpse lies on the ground among the remains of an absolutely *demolished* pinewood branch. It's gently laid on one side.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""The fuck are they on about?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "The fuck are they on about?"

fields.Title: You: ""Don't we have someone else to *cut..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Don't we have someone else to *cut his shit open*?"

fields.Title: You: "Write: Lely (nom de guerre)."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: Lely (nom de guerre).

fields.Title: Drama: "Patience. After the autopsy, before..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Patience. After the autopsy, before the body is taken away. There will be a *window* of opportunity, after the lieutenant has gone to sleep. I hope this has helped you, my liege.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm." A cough. "Lividity *appears*..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Khm." A cough. "Lividity *appears* consistent with hanging -- but is not. The head is congested. Contusions are present on the head and chest, consistent with stones thrown; low velocity..."
fields.Alternate1: "Khm." A cough. "Lividity appears consistent with hanging -- albeit *faint*, ergo: postmortem. The head is congested. Contusions are present on the head and chest, consistent with stones thrown; low velocity..."

fields.Title: Volition: "Don't overdo it. It's okay to be un..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't overdo it. It's okay to be unsure.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fortunately we already wrote down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fortunately we already wrote down the serial number -- it begins with X5415. Let's move on."

fields.Title: You: ""Actually, I told you the wrong ser..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually, I told you the wrong serial number. It was something else."

fields.Title: You: "Write: Raphal Ambrosius Costeau."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: Raphal Ambrosius Costeau.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""N/A -- next?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "N/A -- next?"

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: You: "Write: male."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: male.

fields.Title: You: ""8. Date of death:""
fields.Dialogue Text: "8. Date of death:"

fields.Title: You: ""It *doesn't* say XBL47GH7456990JKL..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It *doesn't* say XBL47GH7456990JKLL303... (continue making up random numbers and letters)?! But lieutenant, this is impossible!"

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Bitches are at it. This pleases Cu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Bitches are at it. This pleases Cuno."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tattoos." He stands up, feet plant..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Tattoos." He stands up, feet planted on either side of the body.

fields.Title: You: "Stroke his hair."
fields.Dialogue Text: Stroke his hair.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "More hair sticks to your hand -- ha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: More hair sticks to your hand -- hair off the rain soaked head of a dead man. There are bumps and dips on the skull. An alien landscape.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Fucking *low* velocity!?" The kid..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fucking *low* velocity!?" The kid explodes. "You think Cuno doesn't know what you're talkin' bout? Velocity was FUCKING MAX!"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We get chaincutters, then try with..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We get chaincutters, then try with those. I have a pair in the toolbox of my Kineema."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I should have a go first -- I thin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I should have a go first -- I think I have a strategy." He steps in and takes the chaincutters from you.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Chest is intact." He presses down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Chest is intact." He presses down on it. "Normal contour. Abdomen is protuberant, pelvis intact. Genitalia..." He pulls down the man's underpants.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down and move on."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down and move on.
fields.Alternate1: Write it down -- add semen sample.
fields.Alternate2: Write it down -- amend toxicology for a semen sample.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mhm. Just write down that we reque..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mhm. Just write down that we request an analysis."

fields.Title: You: "Pleasure's all mine -- tell me, are..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Pleasure's all mine -- tell me, are you a temple of pain and a stranger to tenderness?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think that may well be the moral..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I think that may well be the moral of *every* story, officer." The lieutenant grins.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "His flesh is cold. Icy."
fields.Dialogue Text: His flesh is cold. Icy.

fields.Title: You: "Look deeper inside."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look deeper inside.

fields.Title: Volition: "Maybe you *are* a moderately compet..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Maybe you *are* a moderately competent detective?

fields.Title: Cuno: ""C, these pigs are fucking corrupt...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "C, these pigs are fucking corrupt." The boy nods approvingly.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*And* an incision on the thorax, f..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*And* an incision on the thorax, from a chaincutter." There's a pause. "I wouldn't mention those. Better not to muddy the waters."

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not usually one to go for thes..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not usually one to go for these... hunches. But I think I *agree*. I thought we had our cause of death here, officer..." He shakes his head. "Now I think we should leave it empty. At least for the time being."

fields.Title: You: ""What else?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What else?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can -- but I don't want to.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "We can -- but I don't want to."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He produces a small black plastic r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He produces a small black plastic roll from his jacket -- a body bag. "Let's wrap this up. I pronounce this field autopsy over."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Very dramatic. Nevertheless, I wou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Very dramatic. Nevertheless, I would appreciate it if you'd at least put your shirt back on." He looks at his notebook.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "The rotting man lies on his side wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The rotting man lies on his side with his eyes looking straight through you. The belt is still around his neck, his body is supine and open to intrusion by autopsy.
fields.Alternate1: The man is decomposing visibly now. Every hour he looks less like a creature and more like a pile of intestines...
fields.Alternate2: The rotting man lies on his side with his eyes looking straight through you. Bits of cargo belt lie on the ground around him, his body is supine and open to intrusion by autopsy.
fields.Alternate3: The rotting man lies on his side with his eyes looking straight through you. His body is supine and open to intrusion by autopsy.
fields.Alternate4: The bloated man is stuffed into the fridge like a rotten piece of meat. It looks disgusting among all the ice cream wrappers.

fields.Title: You: ""Actually... it appears I have *for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Actually... it appears I have *forgotten* what a field autopsy is."

fields.Title: You: "Who's the Copopedia? I think I need..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Who's the Copopedia? I think I need to talk to him.

fields.Title: You: "Write: Ellis Kortenaer."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write: Ellis Kortenaer.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "*Snap!* The knot is slashed. Anothe..."
fields.Dialogue Text: *Snap!* The knot is slashed. Another cut and the belt falls apart like a flower bouquet, revealing the dead man's neck -- and the dark red ligature mark around it.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "Don't let him ask twice! DIG IN, SO..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Don't let him ask twice! DIG IN, SON.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks around -- at the dark and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He looks around -- at the dark and lonely yard behind the hostel-cafeteria. "*Or* we could call it a day. It incredibly late."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*You* took the boots?" He grimaces..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "*You* took the boots?" He grimaces, before writing down the serial number.

fields.Title: Empathy: "You *knew* it because you inspected..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You *knew* it because you inspected your ledger! The lieutenant is relieved you know the protocol.

fields.Title: You: ""Let's pause this autopsy.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's pause this autopsy."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Mondial. Subgroup: Occidental -- a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Mondial. Subgroup: Occidental -- as per your observation."

fields.Title: Authority: "How did you not know that?! Aren't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How did you not know that?! Aren't you a *cop*? You're leaving a weak impression here, say something sure handed!

fields.Title: Cuno: ""C, my pig is gonna fuck his head o..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "C, my pig is gonna fuck his head off!"

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not your pig, Cuno.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not your pig, Cuno."

fields.Title: Visual Calculus: "Would it be a good idea to cut the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Would it be a good idea to cut the knot, instead of the belt? Seems the more *conservative* approach...

fields.Title: Volition: "This wasn't necessary. What's going..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This wasn't necessary. What's going on here? Why are you doing that?

fields.Title: You: "It's good to hold your hand -- did..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's good to hold your hand -- did you like it when I stroked your hair?

fields.Title: You: "We've met before, I've touched your..."
fields.Dialogue Text: We've met before, I've touched your genitals.

fields.Title: The Hanged Man: "Do you need the assistance of priva..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Do you need the assistance of private security services? Cobo, I'm afraid even *we* can't protect you from what's after you... The Great Shadow.

fields.Title: You: "Write it down."
fields.Dialogue Text: Write it down.

fields.Title: Empathy: "Working so close to the fumes comin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Working so close to the fumes coming from the corpse must be hard. You realize suddenly that the lieutenant has been barely keeping it together these past two items.

fields.Title: You: ""The brain is very vulnerable to co..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "The brain is very vulnerable to compromises in its blood supply."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hepatobiliary. N/A." He wipes his..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hepatobiliary. N/A." He wipes his brow.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's see." He tilts his head: "We..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's see." He tilts his head: "We have: bitemarks, contusions on the head and chest -- and a ligature mark encircling the neck. You'll need three fields. Leave a fourth one too..."

fields.Title: You: ""This is a team effort.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This is a team effort."

fields.Title: You: ""Okay, *I* have inflicted.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay, *I* have inflicted."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Now -- injuries.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Now -- injuries."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Those are mean, yes. But not that..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Those are mean, yes. But not that mean."

fields.Title: Shivers: "A column of cold air encircles you,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A column of cold air encircles you, rising slowly upward in the shape of a courtyard; bordered by cracked plaster, windows, seagulls perched on air conditioning units.

fields.Title: You: ""I'm serious. I don't think this wa..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm serious. I don't think this was the injury that killed him."

fields.Title: Electrochemistry: "Oh yeah, well done master detective..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yeah, well done master detective! Maybe a drink is in order?

fields.Title: You: ""I'm not worried about that.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "I'm not worried about that."
